content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: orange_wool
inventory=[{"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 44, "index": 14}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 4, "index": 20}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "vindicator_spawn_egg", "quantity": 46, "index": 36}, {"type": "dark_prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 37, "index": 44}]

thought: In order to craft orange_wool, I need to craft white_wool and then dye it orange. The white_wool requires 4 strings in a square shape, so I will start by moving one string from slot 20 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: orange_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 44, "index": 14}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 3, "index": 20}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "vindicator_spawn_egg", "quantity": 46, "index": 36}, {"type": "dark_prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 37, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I need to place another string to the right of the first one, so I will move another string from slot 20 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: orange_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 44, "index": 14}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "vindicator_spawn_egg", "quantity": 46, "index": 36}, {"type": "dark_prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 37, "index": 44}]
thought: Next, I need to move a string below the first one, so I will move a string from slot 20 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: orange_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 44, "index": 14}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "vindicator_spawn_egg", "quantity": 46, "index": 36}, {"type": "dark_prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 37, "index": 44}]
thought: Finally, I need to move a string to the right of the second one, so I will move a string from slot 20 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: orange_wool
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 44, "index": 14}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "vindicator_spawn_egg", "quantity": 46, "index": 36}, {"type": "dark_prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 37, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the white_wool, I need to move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11) before I can dye it.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: orange_wool
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 44, "index": 14}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "vindicator_spawn_egg", "quantity": 46, "index": 36}, {"type": "dark_prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 37, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft an orange_wool, I need to place 1 orange_dye and 1 white_wool in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the white_wool from slot 11 to the crafting grid in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: orange_wool
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 44, "index": 14}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "vindicator_spawn_egg", "quantity": 46, "index": 36}, {"type": "dark_prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 37, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I have the white_wool in the crafting grid, I need to add the orange_dye next to it. Therefore, I will move the orange_dye from slot 29 to the crafting grid in slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: orange_wool
inventory=[{"type": "orange_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 44, "index": 14}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "vindicator_spawn_egg", "quantity": 46, "index": 36}, {"type": "dark_prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 37, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the orange_wool, I need to move it to my inventory. Therefore, I will move the orange_wool from slot 0 to the inventory in slot 11.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
